title: 新约 - 约翰福音(John) - 第 7 章
subTitle: 新约 -- 约翰福音(John) -- 第 7 章 ( 本篇共有 21 章 )

lineList.en: After these things Jesus walked in Galilee: for he would not walk in Jewry, because the Jews sought to kill him.
lineList.cn: 这事以后，耶稣在加利利游行，不愿在犹太游行。因为犹太人想要杀他。

lineList.en: Now the Jews' feast of tabernacles was at hand.
lineList.cn: 当时犹太人的住棚节近了。

lineList.en: His brethren therefore said unto him, Depart hence, and go into Judaea, that thy disciples also may see the works that thou doest.
lineList.cn: 耶稣的弟兄就对他说，你离开这里上犹太去吧，叫你的门徒也看见你所行的事。

lineList.en: For there is no man that doeth any thing in secret, and he himself seeketh to be known openly. If thou do these things, shew thyself to the world.
lineList.cn: 人要显扬名声，没有在暗处行事的。你如果行这事，就当将自己显明给世人看。

lineList.en: For neither did his brethren believe in him.
lineList.cn: 因为连他的弟兄说这话，是因为不信他。

lineList.en: Then Jesus said unto them, My time is not yet come: but your time is alway ready.
lineList.cn: 耶稣就对他们说，我的时候还没有到。你们的时候常是方便的。

lineList.en: The world cannot hate you; but me it hateth, because I testify of it, that the works thereof are evil.
lineList.cn: 世人不能恨你们，却是恨我。因为我指证他们所作的事是恶的。

lineList.en: Go ye up unto this feast: I go not up yet unto this feast: for my time is not yet full come.
lineList.cn: 你们上去过节吧。我现在不上去过这节。因为我的时候还没有满。

lineList.en: When he had said these words unto them, he abode still in Galilee.
lineList.cn: 耶稣说了这话，仍旧住在加利利。

lineList.en: But when his brethren were gone up, then went he also up unto the feast, not openly, but as it were in secret.
lineList.cn: 但他兄弟上去以后，他也上去过节，不是明去，似乎是暗去的。

lineList.en: Then the Jews sought him at the feast, and said, Where is he?
lineList.cn: 正在节期，犹太人寻梢耶稣说，他在那里。

lineList.en: And there was much murmuring among the people concerning him: for some said, He is a good man: others said, Nay; but he deceiveth the people.
lineList.cn: 众人为他纷纷议论。有的说，他是好人。有的说，不然，他是迷惑众人的。

lineList.en: Howbeit no man spake openly of him for fear of the Jews.
lineList.cn: 只是没有人明明的讲论他，因为怕犹太人。

lineList.en: Now about the midst of the feast Jesus went up into the temple, and taught.
lineList.cn: 到了节期，耶稣上殿里去教训人。

lineList.en: And the Jews marvelled, saying, How knoweth this man letters, having never learned?
lineList.cn: 犹太人就希奇说，这个人没有学过，怎吗明白书呢。

lineList.en: Jesus answered them, and said, My doctrine is not mine, but his that sent me.
lineList.cn: 耶稣说，我的教训不是我自己的，乃是那差我来者的。

lineList.en: If any man will do his will, he shall know of the doctrine, whether it be of God, or whether I speak of myself.
lineList.cn: 人若立志遵着他的旨意行，就必晓得这教训或是出于神，或是我凭着自己说的。

lineList.en: He that speaketh of himself seeketh his own glory: but he that seeketh his glory that sent him, the same is true, and no unrighteousness is in him.
lineList.cn: 人凭着自己说，是求自己的荣耀。惟有求那差他来者的荣耀，这人是真的，在他心里没有不义。

lineList.en: Did not Moses give you the law, and yet none of you keepeth the law? Why go ye about to kill me?
lineList.cn: 摩西岂不是传律法给你们吗。你们却没有一个人守律法。为什么想要杀我呢。

lineList.en: The people answered and said, Thou hast a devil: who goeth about to kill thee?
lineList.cn: 众人回答说，你是被鬼附着了。谁想要杀你。

lineList.en: Jesus answered and said unto them, I have done one work, and ye all marvel.
lineList.cn: 耶稣说，我作了一件事，你们都以为希奇。

lineList.en: Moses therefore gave unto you circumcision; (not because it is of Moses, but of the fathers;) and ye on the sabbath day circumcise a man.
lineList.cn: 摩西传割礼给你们，（其实不是从摩西起的，乃是从祖先起的）因此你们也要在安息日给人行割礼。

lineList.en: If a man on the sabbath day receive circumcision, that the law of Moses should not be broken; are ye angry at me, because I have made a man every whit whole on the sabbath day?
lineList.cn: 人若在安息日受割礼，免得违背摩西的律法。我在安息日叫一个人全然好了，你们就向我生气吗。

lineList.en: Judge not according to the appearance, but judge righteous judgment.
lineList.cn: 不可按外貌断定是非，总要按公平断定是非。

lineList.en: Then said some of them of Jerusalem, Is not this he, whom they seek to kill?
lineList.cn: 耶路撒冷人中有的说，这不是他们想要杀的人吗。

lineList.en: But, lo, he speaketh boldly, and they say nothing unto him. Do the rulers know indeed that this is the very Christ?
lineList.cn: 你看他还明明的讲道，他们也不向他说什么。难道官长真知道这是基督吗。

lineList.en: Howbeit we know this man whence he is: but when Christ cometh, no man knoweth whence he is.
lineList.cn: 然而我们知道这个人从那里来。只是基督来的时候，没有人知道他是从那里来的。

lineList.en: Then cried Jesus in the temple as he taught, saying, Ye both know me, and ye know whence I am: and I am not come of myself, but he that sent me is true, whom ye know not.
lineList.cn: 那时耶稣在殿里教训人，大声说，你们也知道我，也知道我从那里来。我来并不是由于自己，但那差我来的是真的。你们不认识他。

lineList.en: But I know him: for I am from him, and he hath sent me.
lineList.cn: 我却认识他。因为我是从他来的，他也差了我来。

lineList.en: Then they sought to take him: but no man laid hands on him, because his hour was not yet come.
lineList.cn: 他们就想要捉拿耶稣。只是没有人下手，因为他的时候还没有到。

lineList.en: And many of the people believed on him, and said, When Christ cometh, will he do more miracles than these which this man hath done?
lineList.cn: 但众人中间有些信他的，说，基督来的时候，他所行的神迹，岂能比这人所行的更多吗。

lineList.en: The Pharisees heard that the people murmured such things concerning him; and the Pharisees and the chief priests sent officers to take him.
lineList.cn: 法利赛人听见众人为耶稣这样纷纷议论，祭司长和法利赛人，就打发差役去捉拿他。

lineList.en: Then said Jesus unto them, Yet a little while am I with you, and then I go unto him that sent me.
lineList.cn: 于是耶稣说，我还有不多的时候和你们同在，以后就回到差我来的那里去。

lineList.en: Ye shall seek me, and shall not find me: and where I am, thither ye cannot come.
lineList.cn: 你们要找我，却找不着。我所在的地方你们不能到。

lineList.en: Then said the Jews among themselves, Whither will he go, that we shall not find him? will he go unto the dispersed among the Gentiles, and teach the Gentiles?
lineList.cn: 犹太人就彼此对问说，这人要往那里去，叫我们找不着呢。难道他要往散住希腊中的犹太人那里去教训希腊人吗。

lineList.en: What manner of saying is this that he said, Ye shall seek me, and shall not find me: and where I am, thither ye cannot come?
lineList.cn: 他说，你们要找我，却找不着，我所在的地方，你们不能到。这话是什么意思呢。

lineList.en: In the last day, that great day of the feast, Jesus stood and cried, saying, If any man thirst, let him come unto me, and drink.
lineList.cn: 节期的末日，就是最大之日，耶稣站着高声说，人若渴了，可以到我这里来喝。

lineList.en: He that believeth on me, as the scripture hath said, out of his belly shall flow rivers of living water.
lineList.cn: 信我的人，就如经上所说，从他复中要流出活水的江河来。

lineList.en: (But this spake he of the Spirit, which they that believe on him should receive: for the Holy Ghost was not yet given; because that Jesus was not yet glorified.)
lineList.cn: 耶稣这话是指着信他之人，要受圣灵说的，那时还没有赐下圣灵来，因为耶稣尚未得着荣耀。

lineList.en: Many of the people therefore, when they heard this saying, said, Of a truth this is the Prophet.
lineList.cn: 众人听见这话，有的说，这真是那先知。

lineList.en: Others said, This is the Christ. But some said, Shall Christ come out of Galilee?
lineList.cn: 有的说，这是基督。但也有的说，基督岂是从加利利出来的吗。

lineList.en: Hath not the scripture said, That Christ cometh of the seed of David, and out of the town of Bethlehem, where David was?
lineList.cn: 经上岂不是说，基督是大卫的后裔，从大卫本乡伯利恒出来的吗。

lineList.en: So there was a division among the people because of him.
lineList.cn: 于是众人因着耶稣起了分争。

lineList.en: And some of them would have taken him; but no man laid hands on him.
lineList.cn: 其中有人要捉拿他。只是无人下手。

lineList.en: Then came the officers to the chief priests and Pharisees; and they said unto them, Why have ye not brought him?
lineList.cn: 差役回到祭司长和法利赛人那里。他们对差役说，你们为什么没有带他来呢。

lineList.en: The officers answered, Never man spake like this man.
lineList.cn: 差役回答说，从来没有像他这样说话的。

lineList.en: Then answered them the Pharisees, Are ye also deceived?
lineList.cn: 法利赛人说，你们也受了迷惑吗。

lineList.en: Have any of the rulers or of the Pharisees believed on him?
lineList.cn: 官长或是法利赛人，岂有信他的呢。

lineList.en: But this people who knoweth not the law are cursed.
lineList.cn: 但这些不明白律法的百姓，是被咒诅的。

lineList.en: Nicodemus saith unto them, (he that came to Jesus by night, being one of them,)
lineList.cn: 内中有尼哥底母，就是从前去见耶稣的，对他们说，

lineList.en: Doth our law judge any man, before it hear him, and know what he doeth?
lineList.cn: 不先听本人的口供，不知道他所作的事，难道我们的律法还定他的罪吗。

lineList.en: They answered and said unto him, Art thou also of Galilee? Search, and look: for out of Galilee ariseth no prophet.
lineList.cn: 他们回答说，你也是出于加利利吗。你且去查考，就可知道，加利利没有出过先知。

lineList.en: And every man went unto his own house.
